fact.description: The first-half is just kicking off.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Throw-in for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Mexico are pushing forward but Miguel Layun's finish is wide of the goal.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
Pedro Proenca awards Mexico a goal kick.
Pedro Proenca signals a Netherlands throw-in in Mexico's half.
Miguel Layun of Mexico gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Throw-in Mexico.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Netherlands.
Ball safe as Mexico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bruno Martins Indi is on a sub for Nigel de Jong for Netherlands.
Throw-in for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Mexico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Estadio Castelao.
Can Mexico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Ball safe as Netherlands is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Netherlands.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Mexico territory.
Mexico's Hector Herrera misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Estadio Castelao.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Mexico territory.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Mexico in their own half.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mexico push forward at Estadio Castelao and Hector Herrera gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Netherlands defence.
Corner awarded to Mexico.
Georginio Wijnaldum (Netherlands) strikes at Estadio Castelao but his header is cleared.
Mexico's Carlos Salcido is on target but unsuccessful.
Mexico have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Georginio Wijnaldum.
Play has been resumed at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Mexico in their own half.
Netherlands's Georginio Wijnaldum is back in action after a slight knock.
Netherlands are coming forward and Robin van Persie gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Mexico goal kick.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Estadio Castelao.
Giovani Dos Santos of Mexico smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Mexico in their own half.
Play has been resumed.
Pedro Proenca awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Goal kick for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Ball goes out of play for a Mexico goal kick.
Mexico drive forward and Giovani Dos Santos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Mexico.
Pedro Proenca awards Mexico a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Hector Moreno is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in Mexico.
Ball safe as Netherlands is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Mexico in their own half.
Play is underway once more.
Mexico make their first substitution with Diego Reyes replacing Hector Moreno.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Mexico.
Mexico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mexico take a 0-1 lead thanks to Giovani Dos Santos.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Estadio Castelao.
Ball safe as Mexico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Mexico.
Rafael Marquez (Mexico) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
Free kick Netherlands.
In Fortaleza, Wesley Sneijder of Netherlands is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Goal kick for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Pedro Proenca signals a Mexico throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Oribe Peralta for Mexico drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Memphis Depay is replacing Paul Verhaegh for Netherlands at Estadio Castelao.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mexico's half?
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Stefan de Vrij gets his shot on target but fails to score for Netherlands.
Netherlands have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Mexico in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a Netherlands throw-in in Mexico's half.
Pedro Proenca awards Mexico a goal kick.
Netherlands's Wesley Sneijder gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mexico defender.
Javier Aquino is on a sub for Giovani Dos Santos for Mexico.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mexico's half?
Throw-in Netherlands.
Mexico have a goal kick.
Pedro Proenca awards Mexico a goal kick.
Free kick Netherlands.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Netherlands's Daley Blind breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Mexico drive forward but Oribe Peralta is judged offside.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Mexico territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Mexico goal kick.
Throw-in Mexico.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Mexico's Paul Aguilar has been booked in Fortaleza and will miss the next match through suspension.
Mexico needs to be cautious. Netherlands have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Estadio Castelao.
Goal kick for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Netherlands are coming forward and Wesley Sneijder gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Mexico in their own half.
In Fortaleza Netherlands drive forward through Arjen Robben. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Mexico make their third substitution with Javier Hernandez replacing Oribe Peralta.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Ron Vlaar (Netherlands) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Mexico goal kick.
Klaas Jan Huntelaar is on a sub for Robin van Persie for Netherlands.
Pedro Proenca has blown to resume play in Fortaleza.
Carlos Salcido for Mexico gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
Free kick Mexico.
Can Mexico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Ball safe as Netherlands is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Netherlands's Klaas Jan Huntelaar has run offside.
Mexico to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Important block from the Mexico defence as Memphis Depay fires in a strike for Netherlands.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
That's a fine assist from Klaas Jan Huntelaar.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the second half in Fortaleza.
Netherlands's Memphis Depay gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Mexico at Estadio Castelao.
Rafael Marquez (Mexico) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Netherlands have been given a penalty at Estadio Castelao...
Andres Guardado for Mexico has been booked by Pedro Proenca and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Klaas Jan Huntelaar gives Netherlands a 2-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Pedro Proenca signals a Mexico throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Mexico push forward through Javier Aquino, whose finish on goal is saved.
Pedro Proenca awards Netherlands a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
